import{format,formatDistanceToNow}from'date-fns';// ----------------------------------------------------------------------
export function fDate(date){return format(new Date(date),'dd MMMM yyyy');}export function fDateTime(date){return format(new Date(date),'dd MMM yyyy HH:mm');}export function fDateTimeSuffix(date){return format(new Date(date),'dd/MM/yyyy hh:mm p');}export function fToNow(date){return formatDistanceToNow(new Date(date),{addSuffix:true});}
